categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: The Battle of Gendrah-Narvin was a battle including the Rebel Alliance and the Galactic Empire during the Galactic Civil War. During this battle, the Alliance lost important agents. The lead pilot of Scandium Team, Jouffer Talamiin, was injured and became permanently handicapped. Due to this, he was replaced with fellow Scandium Aven Cholus. Princess Leia Organa of Alderaan intervene in the battle. She transmitted mesages, dispensed much-needed material, and brought time for the Rebel evacuation.
